name: Virus Share Knowledge
description:
Puzzle fast pace game

How much do you know, about how the memory of the immune system works?

Implementation of the "Shared knowledge" theme

You will play as a Macrophage

_____________________________________________________________________________________

These kinds of blood cells are known for combating any threats to the body.

Also for their incredible ability to learn as a network. And adapt to overcome any kind of pathogens.

"Sharing their biological knowledge to their children, for generations".

_____________________________________________________________________________________

The story is about a girl who is about to die. And his destiny would be completely determined by how strong her immune system is.

Who will win?

Your immune system vs pathogen.

___________________________________________________________________________

Gameplay

You have to recollect structure data from the viruses, to have children who will be prepared for this kind of pathogens in the future.

You need to recollect them in a limited time (Before she dies). So you have to carefully pick your paths.

Good luck.
